Worcester.Houghton Street Historic District: The Houghton Street Historic District is a historic district on Houghton Street between Palm and Dorchester Streets in Worcester, Massachusetts. It consists of seven triple-decker residences (six on the odd-numbered side of Houghton Street and one on Dorchester Street) and three period garages, all built between 1920 and 1926. The buildings represent a well-preserved and cohesive collection of Colonial Revival residences.
